headline: Arch Capital Group (ACGL): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Arch Capital Group on WorldlyInvest’s Substack. As of 2ⁿᵈ July, Arch Capital Group’s share was trading at $88.38. ACGL’s trailing and forward P/E were 9.06 and 9.78 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. The thesis on Arch Capital Group (ACGL) is built around the company’s strong positioning in a […]
